mapper.insert: insert into member(memID, memPassword, memName, memAge, memGender, memEmail, memProfile) values(#{memID},#{memPassword},#{memName},#{memAge},#{memGender},#{memEmail},#{memProfile})
mapper.select: select * from member where memID = #{memID} and memPassword = #{memPassword}
mapper.update: update member set memPassword = #{memPassword}, memName=#{memName}, memAge=#{memAge}, memGender=#{memGender}, memEmail=#{memEmail} where memID=#{memID}
update member set memProfile = #{memProfile} where memID = #{memID}
